trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Olympia
There were no other sightings in Olympia on or around November 9th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in downtown Olympia, WA, when I looked up and saw a very bright light, somewhat spherical in the sky -- it is hard to describe the exact shape. The size seemed to big to be an airplane light but it could have been an airplane reflecting light?? As I passed some trees I lost sight of it, and when I got to a clearing it had disappeared. It was a very overcast day with very heavy, dark grey clouds and this object was very bright and stood out amongst the dark clouds. It was almost like someone was flashing a large, bright light in the sky. I saw it very briefly, maybe 15 seconds. In that brief moment, it did not seem to move. It just seemed such an odd sight, that I kept staring at it. I'm posting in hopes someone else in the area saw it too.
Summary: Very bright light against a very cloudy, overcast sky.
